name: Cube Start Pop Finger
description:
Cube Start Pop Finger is challenging, it look easy at start to help you learn it but afterwards you will have the think hard and consider your tactics.
HOW TO PLAY:
1、just tap on 2 or more nearby cubes from the same color to crush.
2、Complete the missions and collect different items to win.
3、Your moves are limited so you better use them wisely!
